SettingsAccountPage.UsernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters.
SettingsAccountPage.UsernameMaxLength: Username must be at most 32 characters.
SettingsAccountPage.UsernameInvalidCharacters: Username can only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores.
SettingsAccountPage.PasswordMinLength: New password must be at least 8 characters.
SettingsAccountPage.PasswordMaxLength: New password must be at most 64 characters.
SettingsAccountPage.PasswordLowercase: New password must include at least one lowercase letter.
SettingsAccountPage.PasswordUppercase: New password must include at least one uppercase letter.
SettingsAccountPage.PasswordNumber: New password must include at least one number.
SettingsAccountPage.InterestsMaxLength: Interest can be up to 64 characters.
SettingsAccountPage.ToneMaxLength: Tone can be up to 24 characters.
SettingsAccountPage.BioMaxLength: Bio can be up to 256 characters.
SettingsAccountPage.BioNote: Tell Z3 briefly who you are.
